TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn

summary.span: 承载一个 对象集合。

span.span: Hosts a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是用于以逻辑方式承载指示二进制状态的单元格的 类的专用类型。The class is a specialized type of the class used to logically host cells that indicate binary state. 在与它相交的每个 中具有关联的 。A has an associated in every that intersects it. 每个单元格提供类似于 控件的用户界面（UI）。Each cell supplies a user interface (UI) that is similar to a control. 此列类型的默认排序模式为 。The default sort mode for this column type is . 通常，复选框单元值适用于存储（如任何其他数据）或用于执行批量操作。Typically, check box cell values are intended either for storage, like any other data, or for performing bulk operations. 如果希望在用户单击复选框单元时立即做出响应，可以处理 事件，但此事件发生在更新单元格值之前。If you want to respond immediately when users click a check box cell, you can handle the event, but this event occurs before the cell value is updated. 如果在单击时需要新值，一个选项是根据当前值计算预期值的值。If you need the new value at the time of the click, one option is to calculate what the expected value will be based on the current value. 另一种方法是立即提交更改，并处理 事件来对其进行响应。Another approach is to commit the change immediately, and handle the event to respond to it. 若要在单击单元格时提交更改，必须处理 事件。To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the event. 在处理程序中，如果当前单元格为复选框单元，则调用 方法，并传入 值。In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 来标记哪些员工不在办公室。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to mark which employees are out of the office. 此示例是 类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#20)]

para.span: 当从 派生并向派生类添加新属性时，请确保重写 方法，以便在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 还应调用基类的 方法，以便将基类的属性复制到新单元。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

summary.span: 将 类的新实例初始化为默认状态。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class to the default state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此无参数的构造函数等效于向 构造函数提供 `false` 的参数。Using this parameterless constructor is equivalent to supplying an argument of `false` to the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool threeState) cil managed

param.name: threeState
param.span: 如果为 ，则显示具有三种状态的复选框；如果为 ，则显示具有两种状态的复选框。

span.span: to display check boxes with three states; to display check boxes with two states.

summary.span: 初始化 的新实例并将其配置为显示具有两种或三种状态的复选框。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the and configures it to display check boxes with two or three states.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数通过设置以下属性来初始化列。This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties. |属性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||一个新的 ，其 属性已初始化为 `threeState` 参数值。A new with its property initialized to the `threeState` parameter value.| ||`threeState` 参数的值。The value of the `threeState` parameter.| ||| | 属性返回的 对象的 属性。The property of the object returned by the property.|| | 属性返回的 对象的 属性。The property of the object returned by the property.|如果 为 `threeState`，则为 `true`；否则为 `false`。 if `threeState` is `true`; otherwise, `false`.|

summary.span: 获取或设置用于创建新单元格的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.

value.span: 一个 ，列中的所有其他单元格都以它为模型。

span.span: A that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
The default value is a new instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的构造函数将此属性初始化为新创建的 。The constructors for the class initialize this property to a newly created . > [!CAUTION] > 更改单元格模板的属性不会立即影响列现有单元的用户界面（UI）。Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells. 这些更改仅在重新生成列后才明显（例如，通过对列进行排序或通过调用 方法进行）。These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the method). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 来标记哪些员工不在办公室。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to mark which employees are out of the office. 单元模板用于对复选框列中的所有单元应用相同的颜色。The cell template is used to apply the same color to all cells in the check box column. 此示例是 类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#20)]

summary.span: 获取或设置列的默认单元格样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
The to be applied as the default style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回的默认 具有以下初始属性值：The default returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` 属性`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|默认值Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| ||| ||如果初始 属性值 `true`，则 ;否则，`false`。 if the initial property value is `true`; otherwise, `false`.| 这些值覆盖 控件的 属性中指定的值，但可能被其他单元格样式属性重写。These values override the value specified in the property of the control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). 如果 属性返回的对象的 属性的值为 `false`，则将 属性值更改为 `true` 会自动将 设置为 。If the property of the object returned by the property has a value of `false`, changing the property value to `true` automatically sets to . 如果 的值为 ，则将 属性值更改为 `false` 会自动将 设置为 `false`。If has a value of , changing the property value to `false` automatically sets to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/CS/changecolumnalignment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/VB/changecolumnalignment.vb#1)]

member this.FalseValue : obj with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置对应于 单元格值（显示为取消选中的复选框）的基础值。

span.span: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of , which appears as an unchecked box.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示将被此列中的单元格视为 值的一个值。

span.span: An representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as a value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 、和 属性确定这些状态在基础数据源中出现时的关联值。The , , and properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source. 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置由 属性返回的 cell 对象的 属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the cell object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置列中每个单元格的 属性，并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 跟踪 office 照明的状态。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 属性将 "turnedOff" 与 `false`相关联， 属性将 "turnedOn" 与 `true`关联， 属性将 "unknown" 关联到不确定。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/cpp/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/CS/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/VB/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.vb#0)]

value.span: 指示列中单元格外观的 值。

span.span: A value indicating the appearance of cells in the column.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用视觉样式显示复选框单元，请将此属性设置为 并在 之前调用 方法。To display the check box cells using visual styles, set this property to and call the method before . 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置由 属性返回的 cell 对象的 属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the cell object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置列中每个单元格的 属性，并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 来标记哪些员工不在办公室。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to mark which employees are out of the office. 此示例是 类概述主题中提供的一个更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#20)]

summary.span: 获取或设置对应于不确定或 单元格值（显示为禁用复选框）的基础值。

span.span: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to an indeterminate or cell value, which appears as a disabled checkbox.

value.span: 一个 ，表示将被此列中单元格视为不确定值的一个值。

span.span: An representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as an indeterminate value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 、和 属性确定这些状态在基础数据源中出现时的关联值。The , , and properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source. 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置由 属性返回的 cell 对象的 属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the cell object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置列中每个单元格的 属性，并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 跟踪 office 照明的状态。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 属性将 "turnedOff" 与 `false`相关联， 属性将 "turnedOn" 与 `true`关联， 属性将 "unknown" 关联到不确定。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/cpp/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/CS/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/VB/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.vb#0)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此寄宿的复选框单元格是否允许三种复选状态而不是两种。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted check box cells will allow three check states rather than two.

value.span: 如果寄宿的 对象能够具有第三种（即不确定）状态，则值为 ；否则值为 。

span.span: if the hosted objects are able to have a third, indeterminate, state; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks "不确定" 状态可能很有用，例如，当您不希望在复选框中设置默认值时。The indeterminate state can be useful, for example, when you do not want to set a default value in the check box. 获取或设置此属性将获取或设置由 属性返回的 cell 对象的 属性。Getting or setting this property gets or sets the property of the cell object returned by the property. 设置此属性还会设置列中每个单元格的 属性，并刷新列显示。Setting this property also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要覆盖单个单元的指定值，请在设置列值后设置单元值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. 如果 属性返回的对象的 属性的值为 `false`，则将 属性值更改为 `true` 会自动将 设置为 。If the property of the object returned by the property has a value of `false`, changing the property value to `true` automatically sets to . 如果 的值为 ，则将 属性值更改为 `false` 会自动将 设置为 `false`。If has a value of , changing the property value to `false` automatically sets to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 跟踪 office 照明的状态。The following code example uses a to track the status of office lighting. 属性将 "turnedOff" 与 `false`相关联， 属性将 "turnedOn" 与 `true`关联， 属性将 "unknown" 关联到不确定。The property associates "turnedOff" with `false`, the property associates "turnedOn" with `true`, and the property associates "unknown" to indeterminate. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/cpp/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/CS/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTrinaryVirtualCheckBox/VB/trivaluevirtualcheckbox.vb#0)]
